backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling user profiles, employee CRUD, and leave management with strict admin authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark theme tokens and shared UI variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point including a process.env polyfill ensuring II_URL is safely defined at runtime.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React app configuring routing, authentication gating, and global ErrorBoundary wrapping.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied message for authenticated non-admin users with a sign-out option.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Internet Identity login/logout button with loading handling and query cache reset on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting new users to enter their name and submit initial profile data.
frontend/src/components/common/ConfirmDi: Reusable confirmation dialog for destructive actions with optional loading state.
frontend/src/components/common/ErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a reload prompt with optional error details.
frontend/src/components/employees/AddEmp: Dialog form for creating a new employee, validating input and submitting via useAddEmployee.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: App header displaying logo, app title, and logged‑in user info with a login button.
frontend/src/components/layout/BottomNav: Mobile bottom navigation bar with links and active route highlighting.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileLay: Layout wrapper combining header, main content, and bottom navigation for mobile screens.
frontend/src/components/leaves/EditLeave: Dialog for editing a leave entry including date and type selection, updating via useUpdateLeave.
frontend/src/components/leaves/LeaveResu: Displays a list of leave entries with edit and delete actions using dialogs and useDeleteLeave.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and stored identity loading.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping actor API calls for user profiles, employees, and leave entries with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light and dark mode CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/lib/export/csv.ts: Generates and downloads a CSV of leave records with employee names and formatted dates.
frontend/src/lib/leaves/monthlySummary.t: Groups leave entries by month and returns a sorted monthly summary.
frontend/src/lib/mappers/leaveType.ts: Maps leave types to human-readable labels and vice versa.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Utility function for merging Tailwind class names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry configuring React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AddLeavePage.tsx: Form page to create a new leave entry, validating inputs and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeeLeaveHistoryP: Displays an employee’s leave history, monthly summary, and CSV export option.
frontend/src/pages/EmployeesPage.tsx: Lists all employees with navigation to history pages and includes add-employee dialog.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home dashboard showing quick stats and navigation shortcuts for leave and employee actions.
frontend/src/pages/SearchPage.tsx: Implements a leave-record search page with employee selection, date-range filters, query hooks, on-demand filtering, and CSV export.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL or hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, themes, animations, plugins, and container settings for the frontend UI.
